# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(Denovo_database)

ADD_DATABASE_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(Denovo)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
DenovoPluginInfo.C
DenovoCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
DenovoPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
DenovoMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtDenovoFileFormat.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
DenovoEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtDenovoFileFormat.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${HDF5_INCLUDE_DIR}
${VISIT_DATABASE_INCLUDES}
)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${HDF5_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IDenovoDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IDenovoDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IDenovoDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MDenovoDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MDenovoDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser ${HDF5_LIB} )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MDenovoDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MDenovoDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EDenovoDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EDenovoDatabase_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtdatabase_ser ${HDF5_LIB} )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EDenovoDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EDenovoDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EDenovoDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EDenovoDatabase_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtdatabase_par ${HDF5_LIB} )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EDenovoDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EDenovoDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_OUTPUT_DIR(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(databases Denovo ${INSTALLTARGETS})
